job_title: Digital Engagement Manager in Port Talbot, Wales
pros: Beyond Carnism is a mission-driven organization comprising a team of passionate and committed individuals. The work is varied, exciting, and meaningful. In terms of working practices, there is a focus on flexibility, sustainability, and wellbeing. Since joining, I have felt included and supported at all times, and my comments and suggestions have been welcomed. The team culture is friendly and inclusive, and there is plenty of room for professional growth.
cons: Given that I work remotely, there are fewer opportunities to spend time with my colleagues than I would like. Having said that, the organization is committed to maintaining a positive and engaged team culture, and I talk to my colleagues on a daily basis. The organization also arranges occasional in-person meetings.
